Reviews.Title: Wrong Description
Reviews.Author: Flashlight Addict
Reviews.Content: This phone is not manufactured by HTC, which usually makes high-end phones. It's made by ZTE, a Chinese manufacturer, which, along with Huawei, is supplying cheap but low quality entry-level phones for the carriers.

Reviews.Title: buyer beware
Reviews.Author: rocky mt lady
Reviews.Content: In theory this should be a great lil phone for the price, but the reality is, the phone is a low quality product and should be avoided. It has extreme issues, it freezes for no reason, it turns off for no reason, it has issues recharging, it has problems with the battery life. Check the google reviews, seriously, don't purchase this. In two weeks my issues started, and that is when it becomes out of warranty. It is known to be defective. Save yourself the agony of dealing with a product that won't last for even a month.
